mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT u.user_id, u.PASSWORD, u.user_name, u.nick_name, u.email, u.phonenumber, u.role_id, u.sex, u.avatar, u.login_ip, u.login_date, u.STATUS, u.create_time, u.update_time, r.role_name, r.role_key, r.role_sort FROM sys_user AS u INNER JOIN sys_role AS r ON u.role_id = r.role_id WHERE u.del_flag = '0' AND u.user_name = #{username} AND u.STATUS = '0' AND r.del_flag = '0' AND r.STATUS = '0'
